pages.text: The most powerful thing to do is destroy the world right? Well if you build a $(li:machines/laser_quarry)Laser Quarry$() you can do just that. Additionally, late game machines such as the $(l:machines/rankine_box)Rankine Box$() allow for complete acquisition of all elements (get those advancements).

Hoarding resources is always a smart move. Some can be traded for wealth, some can be farmed, and some will be needed to build bigger and better things. Anything could be valuable, as there is more to come...
